Name: Widgeon feather
Description: With shades of brown, it is quite glossy.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Con tonos marrones, es bastante brillante.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Mit Brauntönen ist es ziemlich glänzend.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Avec des nuances de brun, il est assez brillant.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Con sfumature di marrone, è abbastanza lucido.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: ブラウンの色合いで、かなり光沢があります。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Com tons de marrom, ela é bastante lustrosa.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 带有棕色阴影，非常有光泽。
